scenariotests

Class MovePlayerTest

  • java.lang.Object
    • scenariotests.SetUpTestGrid
      • scenariotests.MovePlayerTest

  • public class MovePlayerTest
extends SetUpTestGrid
    Tests the "Move" use case. This class will test scenarios concerning the movement of players. Tests: - No two players on one square - Cannot move on wall - Cannot leave grid - Cannot cross lightrail - Player must always do a move action in turn

    • Constructor Summary

      MovePlayerTest(GameMode mode)
      The constructor will be called by junit for every gamemode.
